name: cv-generator
description: CV Generator with React frontend and Python backend

scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:backend: docker-compose exec -T app pytest -c backend/pytest.ini || docker-compose run --rm app pytest -c backend/pytest.ini
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend -- --cov && npm run test:frontend -- --coverage
scripts.lint:backend: docker-compose exec -T app flake8 backend || docker-compose run --rm app flake8 backend
scripts.format:backend: docker-compose exec -T app black backend || docker-compose run --rm app black backend

_comment.rich-text-html-security: Rich-text fields store HTML. All stored HTML should be sanitized server-side before persistence/rendering to avoid stored XSS.
